(jain.) one of the fourteen best non-living matter supposed to be got naturally by the emperors.
= ಅಜಿಗಿಜಿ.
= ಅಜಮೋದ.
the plant Indigofera tinctoria of Papilionaceae family; common indigo.
the plant Indigofera tinctoria of Papilionaceae family.
the blue pigment got from that plant.
a she-goat.
the spiritual ignorance.
not conquerable; not over-come; not over-powered; invincible.
that which cannot be conquered.
an invincible man; an unbeaten man.
(in cricket) a score of hundred runs by a batsman without being made out.
an invincible, unconquerable woman.
not belonging to an organism; inorganic.
the soft substance like fine wool covering the seeds of the plant Chrysophyllum cainito or Calotropis gigantea.
the central portion of a spider-web.
the father of one's father or mother; a grand father.
an old man.
an old man appointed for managing, protecting the royal gynaecium (the inner quarters for the ladies in a palace).
Brahma.
a term of honour affixed to the names of elderly persons;

ಅಜ್ಜನ ಕಾಲದ್ದು ajjana kāladdu (sarc.) that which belongs to distant past; a very old thing; ಅಜ್ಜನಿಗೆ ಮೊಮ್ಮಗ ಆಕಳಿಕೆ ಕಲಿಸಿದ ಹಾಗೆ ajjanige mommaga ākaḷike kalisida hāge, (prov.) = ಅಜ್ಜನಿಗೆ ಮೊಮ್ಮಗ ಕೆಮ್ಮು ಕಲಿಸಿದಹಾಗೆ; = ಅಜ್ಜನಿಗೆ ಮೊಮ್ಮಗ ಕೆಮ್ಮು ಕಲಿಸಿದಹಾಗೆ ajjanige mommaga kemmu kalisida hāge, (prov.) (a simile) a novice teaching an expert; teaching the grand mother to suck eggs; ಅಜ್ಜಾ ಮದುವೆ ಎಂದರೆ, 'ನನಗೋ?' ಎಂದ ajjā maduve endare, 'nanagō' enda (prov.) aging is not for passions; The wolf loses his teeth, but not his inclinations.
= ಅಜ್ಜನಪಟ್ಟೆ.
a crafty thief.
a protection given by old and trust-worthy men.
(fig.) a special protection.
a team of persons providing such a protection.
an old woman.
= ಅಜ್ಜುಗೆ.
the state of being a grandfather.
the qualities or character of a grandfather.
the state of being senior; priority of birth; superior age; seniority.
a position or state of honour.
a fabulous tree Antiaris toxicaria of Moraceae family; upas tree.
(pl.) a grand father and his father; (gen.) forefathers.
(dial.) a portion for which the parents are eligible in the partition of an estate.
= ಅಜ್ಜಪಜ್ಜ.
an old, wise minister.
the mother of one's mother or father; a grand mother.
an old woman.
an old woman appointed in the women's quarter in a palace.
(jain.) a woman-ascetic.
an honourable term appended to a woman's name.
(dial.) a widow with shaven head;

ಅಜ್ಜಿ ಆಟ ajji āṭa a children's play; ಅಜ್ಜಿಯ ಮಂಚ ajjiya mañca (coll.) a most conspicuous northern constellation between Lynx and Draco, which contains more than 50 visible stars, seven of which form the Big Dipper; the Great Bear; the Ursa Major; ಅಜ್ಜಿಯ ಮಂಚ ತಲೆಕೆಳಗಾಗು ajjiya mañca talekeḷagāgu (fig.) to dawn; (day) to begin; ಅಜ್ಜಿ ಹೊರಸು ajjihorasu (dial.) a northern constellation surrounded by Draco and containing the Northern celestial pole and the Little Dipper: Ursa Minor; ಅಜ್ಜಿ ಸಾಕಿದ ಮಗು ajji sākida magu an over-fondled child; a spoilt child; ಅಜ್ಜಿ ಸಾಕಿದ ಮಗು ಬೊಜ್ಜಕ್ಕೂ ಬಾರದು ajji sākida magu bojjakkū bāradu (prov.) mother's darlings are but milksop heroes; ಅಜ್ಜಿ ಇಲ್ಲದ ಮನೆ ಮಜ್ಜಿಗೆ ಇಲ್ಲದ ಊಟ ajji illada mane, majjige illada ūṭa (prov). it is essential that every house has an elderly person; ಅಜ್ಜಿಗೆ ಅರಿವೆ ಚಿಂತೆ, ಮೊಮ್ಮಗಳಿಗೆ ಮಿಂಡನ ಚಿಂತೆ ajjige arive cinte, magaḷige miṇḍana cinte (prov.) each one rides his wish-horse in his own way; every heart hath its own ache; ಅಜ್ಜಿ ನೂತದ್ದೆಲ್ಲ ಅಜ್ಜನ ಉಡಿದಾರಕ್ಕೆ ajji nūtaddella ajjana uḍidārakke (prov.) (one's income or resources) with just enough for immediate needs and nothing left over for the future; from hand to mouth; being on the breadline; ಅಜ್ಜಿಗೆ ಮೊಮ್ಮಗಳು ಕೆಮ್ಮು ಕಲಿಸಿದ ಹಾಗೆ ajjige mommagaḷu kemmu kalisida hāge (prov.) = ಅಜ್ಜನಿಗೆ ಮೊಮ್ಮಗ ಕೆಮ್ಮು ಕಲಿಸಿದಹಾಗೆ.
a story told by a grand mother.
(fig.) an incredible narration or story; a cock and bull storey.
(jain.) a woman ascetic.
a respectable woman.
a knot like a reef-knot, but unsymmetrical, but apt to slip or jam.
(dial.) (the skin) to become wrinkled (as from old age).
the plant Asparagus falcatus of Liliaceae family.
its bulbous root.
= ಅಜ್ಜಿಬಜ್ಜಿ.
the plant Argyreia argentea of Convolvulaceae family; purple convolvulus.
